Affix.Name: Tiny Miracle
Affix.Desc: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A cup commonly used for fortune-telling. It can also hold water, of course.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: Just an ordinary, everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.
